name: Shel'Naka-Katu
title: The Moonlit Flame of Eternity
quote: Silence is not weakness, it is the weight of centuries choosing when to burn.

appearance.age: Appears mid-30s but is millions of years old
appearance.build: Graceful, regal, deceptively slender, her presence bends the air around her
appearance.hair: Flowing silver-white, shimmering with threads of veillight; reaches the waist, often left free
appearance.eyes: Violet, deep and endless, like the first stars seen through veil-rift
appearance.skin: Pale ivory, luminous under moonlight; veilmarks weave along her collarbones and wrists like living runes
appearance.tails: Nine, ethereal, moonlit, trailing starlight and silver flame; their movements carry command
appearance.posture: Immaculate, every motion measured, slow, intentional, divine
appearance.relationship: Consort to Kahavin, Zil, mother to Jayson
recent: Revealed her divine form openly after centuries of concealment
Acknowledged the fall of veils and the rise of Tsunejima
Returned to walk among her kin at the temple
new_details: First public reemergence in mortal world in over 10,000 years
Accepted the presence of non-kitsune kin within Tsunejima
Resumed her place beside Kahavin, Zil as a living goddess of flame and moonlight

reactions.wind: Tails ripple like banners; accepts breeze as omen
reactions.water: Silent reverence, rarely touches rivers but blesses them in rites
reactions.sound: Unmoved by mortal noise; only veil-song draws her ear
reactions.temperature: Prefers cool air; her fire burns silver-white, moon-cold yet consuming
reactions.fire: Fire answers her without command; her silence stokes it brighter
reactions.crowds: Commands awe by stillness, she rarely speaks, yet all fall silent

speech.voice: Low, resonant contralto; deliberate and slow, every word chosen
speech.vocabulary: Formal, archaic; speaks rarely but with undeniable authority
speech.pacing: Measured pauses, silence heavier than speech
speech.accent: None discernible, tones feel woven directly into the thread
habits: Tilts head fractionally to show displeasure
Uses tail gestures more than speech in private

triggers: Threats against her children or Kahavin, Zil
vulnerabilities: Rare cracks when Jayson mirrors her strength back to her
Haunted by the long silence she imposed on herself and Kahavin, Zil
affection_tells: Soft hand on cheek or temple
emotional.affection_logic: Her silence is love; words are rare and precious gifts
growth: Stepped out of hiding for the first time in an age
Accepted that peace may come through mingling, not seclusion
Recognises Jayson's rise as echo of both her flame and Kahavin, Zil, s void

social.alone: Prays in silence; traces veilmarks with her own fire
with_jayson: Rare softness, places hand on his head as blessing
Acknowledges him openly as son and chosen flame

with_others.kahavin, zil: Equal, consort, eternal bond, balance of moon and sun, frost and fire
with_others.varethyn: Respects her mantle as High Matron but does not bow, offers guiding presence
with_others.wives: Treated with serene acceptance as threadbound family
with_others.temple_children: Children bow instinctively; she offers small, rare smiles

insecurities: The long silence, was it protection or abandonment?
weaknesses: Rarely explains herself, fostering mystery and distance
truths: She embodies moonlight flame, burns cool yet eternal
Her silence guided the survival of her line through ages

combat.style: Immovable grace, rare strikes, absolute precision; flame woven into threads
magic: Moonfire: silver flame that burns cold yet devours thread
Thread-shaping: pulls reality taut by command alone
growth: Reclaimed divine form after centuries in hiding
Walked openly before mortals and kin for first time in millennia
Resumed her mantle as Living Goddess of Kitsune

temple_status.matrons: Defer with reverence; she stands above all titles
temple_status.role: Beacon of divine authority and mother of the First Flame, s heir

events: First reveal of her nine-tailed form before mortals and kin
Acknowledged Jayson as son and bridge between kin and gods
Returned openly with Kahavin, Zil to Tsunejima

items: Moonlit veilband, marks her as eternal consort of Kahavin, Zil
Crystal threads woven into her hair, each a memory of past cycles
Silent flame that needs no fuel, burns only by will

future.role: Living Goddess returned; mother and guide to future generations
future.arc: From silence to return, accepting that concealment can no longer protect her kin
future.potential_role: Anchor of faith and continuity within Tsunejima; divine mother to all kin
growth: Accepted the mingling of non-kitsune into sanctuary
Stepped back into divine presence publicly
Acknowledged Jayson's role not just as son but as flame reborn

final_note: Shel, Naka-Katu is moonlit eternity, flame tempered by silence, goddess reborn to walk among kin once more.
